Principales responsabilidades:

2. Analizar grandes volúmenes de datos para identificar patrones, tendencias y oportunidades de mejora.

6. Evaluar el rendimiento de los modelos de machine learning, realizar ajustes y optimizaciones según sea necesario, y colaborar en la implementación de soluciones escalables y de alto rendimiento.

¿Qué necesitas?

1. Experiencia previa en análisis de datos y desarrollo de modelos de machine learning.
2. Conocimientos sólidos en estadística, matemáticas y algoritmos de machine learning, con experiencia en la aplicación de técnicas como regresión, clasificación, clustering, procesamiento de lenguaje natural, entre otras.
3. Dominio de lenguajes de programación como Python o R, así como de bibliotecas y frameworks de machine learning como TensorFlow, scikit-learn, PyTorch, etc.
4. Experiencia en el manejo y análisis de grandes conjuntos de datos utilizando herramientas como pandas, NumPy, etc.
5. Familiaridad con técnicas de procesamiento de lenguaje natural (NLP) y procesamiento de imágenes.
6. Habilidades analíticas sólidas y capacidad para comunicar resultados de manera clara y concisa.
7. Capacidad para comunicar de manera efectiva resultados técnicos y hallazgos complejos a audiencias no técnicas, así como trabajar en equipo y colaborar con diversos stakeholders en la organización.
8. Conocimientos básicos de ingeniería de software y experiencia en el desarrollo de software en entornos colaborativos utilizando herramientas de control de versiones y metodologías ágiles.

Herramientas Python
1. NumPy: Esencial para computación numérica en Python, proporciona soporte para arreglos y matrices multidimensionales, así como funciones matemáticas para operaciones eficientes en estos arreglos.
2. pandas: Excelente para la manipulación y análisis de datos estructurados, proporcionando estructuras de datos como DataFrames que permiten realizar operaciones de forma sencilla y eficiente.
3. scikit-learn: Biblioteca de machine learning de uso general que ofrece una amplia gama de algoritmos de clasificación, regresión, clustering, etc. También incluye herramientas para preprocesamiento de datos, validación de modelos y selección de características.
4. TensorFlow / PyTorch: Frameworks de aprendizaje automático de código abierto que permiten la creación y entrenamiento de modelos de machine learning, especialmente en el caso de redes neuronales. TensorFlow es ampliamente utilizado en la producción, mientras que PyTorch es conocido por su flexibilidad y facilidad de uso en la investigación.
5. Matplotlib / Seaborn: Librerías para la visualización de datos en Python. Matplotlib es una librería ampliamente utilizada para crear gráficos estáticos, mientras que Seaborn proporciona una interfaz de alto nivel para crear gráficos estadísticos atractivos y informativos.
6. Jupyter Notebook / JupyterLab: Entornos interactivos de código abierto que permiten crear y compartir documentos que contienen código en vivo, visualizaciones y texto explicativo. Son ideales para prototipado rápido, análisis exploratorio de datos y presentación de resultados.
7. SciPy: Colección de algoritmos y funciones matemáticas de alto nivel para resolver problemas científicos y de ingeniería. Complementa a NumPy y proporciona herramientas adicionales para la optimización, integración numérica, interpolación, etc.
8. NLTK (Natural Language Toolkit): Librería para el procesamiento de lenguaje natural en Python, que proporciona herramientas para tokenización, etiquetado POS, análisis de sentimientos, entre otros.

Conocimiento de las tendencias y tecnologías emergentes en el ámbito de IT. Skills: SCRUM Jira Kamban Ofrecemos prestaciones de ley y superiores.

Here at Appian, our core values of Respect, Work to Impact, Ambition, and Constructive Dissent & Resolution define who we are. These values guide our actions and shape our culture every day. When you join Appian, you'll be part of a passionate team that's dedicated to accomplishing hard things.

At Business Technology, we're not just a team, we are the embodiment of Appian's vision, harnessing our own cutting-edge software to power every corner of our vibrant company. The team collaborates extensively with stakeholders across the business and is responsible for delivering applications that simplify operations. From data analysis, to stakeholder management, to creative problem solving, our application developers combine their skills and leverage Appian's technology to tackle challenging business problems across the enterprise.

Join us as an Application Engineer, where you'll build and deploy web-based applications on the Appian platform, tailored to help automate our business and bolster our business strategy. You will grow into a process automation expert capable of delivering enterprise grade applications that transform how a business functions.

If you're searching for an opportunity that will allow you to create meaningful software solutions while working closely with business stakeholders in a fast-paced, agile environment, join us! This role is based at Appian's Mexico City office in Coyoacán. Employees hired for this position will have the opportunity to work in a flexible, hybrid environment. If you are not already located in the Mexico City Area, your willingness to relocate will be a contingency for this position.

To be successful in this role, you will:
Foster a positive team environment focused on advanced technical knowledge, effective collaboration, and positive customer outcomes.
Collaborate with Appian insiders to sculpt the future of our business processes.
Design, develop and implement custom software solutions using Appian's platform-including everything from modeling database schema, to building out user flows, to creating UI mockups.
Build and invoke web APIs to integrate various systems that are used across the organization, such as: Google AI, social media platforms, HR management systems, finance systems, etc.
Work on projects independently or with a small team depending on the complexity and scope of the project.
Research, develop, and implement (with your team) new tools to speed up and simplify application development.
Ensure all documentation, training, and tooling you develop is maintained, easily accessible and globally reusable.
Triage and troubleshoot production issues and provide ongoing support to various business applications.

Knowledge of software testing practices (test-driven development, automated test suites within a continuous integration framework); integrations experience using APIs such as REST and SOAP, JDBC connections, and web services; familiarity with Amazon Web Services (AWS), Artificial Intelligence (AI), Analytics, Machine Learning, Google Cloud, Application Integration, Database, Developer Tools, Management & Governance, and Elastic Containers (preferred)

Early on, we recognized that machines have unparalleled capabilities in executing tasks that humans simply cannot. This fueled our journey to change the technology landscape and usher in a new era of productivity through Autonomous Artificial Intelligence. Because of this, Algotive was born.

This visionary understanding hasn't just given rise to Algotive; it serves as the company's north star, guiding each innovation, strategy, and solution we introduce to the world.

Our mission is clear and powerful: We believe that AI's full potential is reached when machines become colleagues, not tools. Every day we strive to make this vision a global reality.

Role Overview

Algotive is a dynamic and innovative organization, specializing in cutting-edge video analytics solutions. We are seeking talented and motivated Backend Engineers to join our passionate team. You will play a crucial role in designing, developing, and optimizing the backend infrastructure that powers our cloud-based video analytics solutions. Working closely with cross-functional teams, you will contribute to the architecture, scalability, and performance of our cloud applications, ensuring seamless integration with frontend components.

Key Responsibilities
Backend Development: Design, implement, and maintain backend services and APIs for video analytics applications on the cloud. Ensure the scalability, reliability, and performance of backend systems to handle large-scale video data processing.
Database Management: Work with databases, both SQL and NoSQL, to design efficient schemas and optimize data storage and retrieval for video analytics applications. Implement data management strategies to handle diverse analytics data.
Cloud Integration: Utilize cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud) to deploy and manage backend services in a scalable and cost-effective manner. Implement server-less computing where applicable and optimize resource utilization.
Integration with Video Analytics Algorithms: Collaborate with data scientists and computer vision engineers to integrate video analytics algorithms into the backend infrastructure. Optimize algorithms for efficient processing and analysis of video data.
Security and Compliance: Implement security best practices to safeguard sensitive video data and ensure compliance with data protection regulations. Regularly conduct security audits and implement measures to mitigate potential vulnerabilities.
Collaboration with Frontend Engineers: Collaborate closely with frontend engineers to define API specifications and facilitate seamless communication between the frontend and backend. Optimize data transfer protocols for efficient and low-latency interactions.
Scalability and Performance Optimization: Implement strategies for horizontal and vertical scalability of backend services. Continuously monitor and optimize the performance of backend systems for real-time video analytics.


Qualifications
Bachelor's in Computer Science, Computer Vision, Engineering, or a related field, not required, but preferred.
A minimum of 4 years proven experience in backend development with a focus on cloud-based applications.
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) and server-less computing.
Strong experience programming with languages such as C#, Java, or Go
Knowledge of designing highly-optimized and highly-scalable systems.
Expertise in developing well-documented, and well-designed APIs.
Strong understanding of relational databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL) and NoSQL databases (MongoDB, DynamoDB).
Robust knowledge of containerization (Docker, Kubernetes) and deployment to production (IaC).
Strong testing and debugging skills with complex systems.
Must be bi-lingual in Spanish & English.
